title: Gut Wellness Questionnaire
description: To be filled after the Lifestyle Medicine Questionnaire

questions.text: Have you experienced significant weight loss over past 1 or 3 months
Is there any recent change in your bowel movements (related to stress, specific foods, sleep etc.)
How frequently do you experience the following symptoms?
How would you describe your appetite?
Do you skip meals due to digestive discomfort?
Do you feel excessively full or sleepy after eating a regular meal?
Do you feel abdominal discomfort or heaviness after meals?
Do you notice any of these symptoms after eating foods?
options: Brain fog (struggle to focus or feel mentally tired even after resting)

questions.text: Have you ever noticed a white coating on your tongue?
Are there any specific foods that trigger symptoms like bloating, gas, diarrhea, or constipation?
Have you undergone any food intolerance or allergy tests before?
Are you currently taking any medications for your digestive or gut-related concerns? If yes, please list them.
How often do you pass stool?
What is the usual consistency of your motion? (based on Bristol Stool Chart)
options: Type 1: Separate hard lumps, like nuts — Severe constipation
Type 2: Sausage-shaped but lumpy — Mild constipation
Type 3: Like a sausage with cracks on the surface — Normal (slightly dehydrated)
Type 4: Smooth, soft sausage or snake — Ideal/Healthy
Type 5: Soft blobs with clear-cut edges — Lacking fiber / Mild diarrhea
Type 6: Fluffy pieces with ragged edges, mushy — Mild/moderate diarrhea
Type 7: Watery, no solid pieces — Severe diarrhea

questions.text: Have you observed any blood or mucus in your stool?
Are you using any supplements to support your gut health? (Check all that apply)
options: Fiber supplements (e.g., psyllium husk, isabgol, inulin)
